code: @Test public void testInterceptLog() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:first").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

public void configure() throws Exception {     // START SNIPPET: e1     // intercept all incomming routes and log it     interceptFrom().to("log:received").     // and here we have a couple of routes     from("direct:start").to("mock:first").to("seda:bar").     from("seda:bar").to("mock:result"). // END SNIPPET: e1 }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             // START SNIPPET: e1             // intercept all incomming routes and log it             interceptFrom().to("log:received").             // and here we have a couple of routes             from("direct:start").to("mock:first").to("seda:bar").             from("seda:bar").to("mock:result").         // END SNIPPET: e1         }     }. }
